sourcesContent:
export default function EditProfilePopup( { isOpen, onClose}) {
    return (
        <PopupWithForm
        name="edit-profile"
        title="Редактировать профиль"
        button="Сохранить"
        isOpen={isOpen}
        onClose={onClose}
        isUpdating={isUpdating}
      >
        <fieldset className="popup__set">
          <label className="popup__form-label">
            <input
              type="text"
              className="popup__item popup__item_type_username"
              placeholder="Имя"
              defaultValue=""
              name="edit__username"
              required=""
              minLength={2}
              maxLength={40}
              id="name"
            />
            <span className="popup__input-error name-error" />
          </label>
          <label className="popup__form-label">
            <input
              type="text"
              className="popup__item popup__item_type_description"
              placeholder="Вид деятельности"
              defaultValue=""
              name="edit__description"
              required=""
              minLength={2}
              maxLength={200}
              id="description"
            />
            <span className="popup__input-error description-error" />
          </label>
        </fieldset>{" "}
      </PopupWithForm>
    )
}
